casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. JOSEPH BABELLA, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 4186 DATED this 18th day of March, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Ten (10) years imposed on January 7, 1977, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Shaun Thompson, Montana Defender Project, for his assistance to the defendant and this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack D. Shanstrom, Chairman; Jack L. Green, Robert C. Sykes.
